MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am to safely carry out repairs to an underground fault at Weensland road Hawick substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 10:04am on Wednesday, 16 December 2020
